ProductInfo.Features:
GW9716LGH-F: Professional 16 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Real-time DVR with HDMI & VGA. Support CDRW/DVD-RW. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW850C: 1/4" Aptina CMOS Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 850 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs. Low Illumination Color: 0.02Lux, B&W;: 0.002Lux. Vandal resistant & water proof
Package Includes: GW9716LGH-F DVR with 4T HD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 16 x GW850C - 1/4" Aptina CMOS CCD Camera
1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x Power pigtail (GW082); 16 x Power pigtail (GW132); 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 16CHE2 16 Channel H.264 960H and D1 Real-Time DVR with 16 x 1/4 Inches Aptina CMOS Camera 850 TVL Vari-Focal Lens Security Camera System (Black/White)
